column4: is there something int apt that does what `yum provides */bin/sendmail` would do?
dpkg --search (I don' know yum, so that may not be right, but it seems likely)
`yum provides */bin/sendmail` will show which package contains */bin/sendmail
Then you either want dpkg --search or apt-file (you'll need to install the latter) - the latter will give the package even if it's not installed.
